original_text: There is none like unto the God of Jeshurun, who rideth upon the heaven in thy help, and in his excellency on the sky.
korean_text: 여수룬이여 하나님 같은 이가 없도다 그가 너를 도우시려고 하늘을 타고 궁창에서 위엄을 나타내시는도다

sentences.original_text: There is none like unto the God of Jeshurun
who rideth upon the heaven in thy help
and in his excellency on the sky
